channel.title: Not able to upload to soundcloud
channel.description: I haven’t been able to upload for a while. When ever a go to upload on SoundCloud, it finishes the loading bar then says upload failed. I don’t know what’s wrong.

item.title: Not able to upload to soundcloud
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
You could be out of upload time.

Another thing might just be phone glitch/error, i’ve gotten them before. Just restart your device and it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: Not able to upload to soundcloud

item.title: Not able to upload to soundcloud
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
Try going to the tracks section in the drop down menu in the corner (with your SC screen name). If your remaining upload time is 0 minutes… then get ready to either pay for SC Pro or to delete some old songs.

If you have enough upload time for the songs you’re posting, then it means SC is down. Check the topic I posted above for help.

Read full topic
item.source: Not able to upload to soundcloud

item.title: Not able to upload to soundcloud
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Yea, u guys are out of upload time

Read full topic
item.source: Not able to upload to soundcloud

item.title: Not able to upload to soundcloud
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
Soundcloud Upload Problems Production Talk
I would like to get a track out today, but unfortunately, Auxy won’t upload to SoundCloud. It simply says ‘Upload Failed.’ [image] I’ve tried again multiple times, but I always get the same message. In Pulse, the uploaded track shows up, but there’s no cover art on anything, and when I press ‘play in SoundCloud,’ I’m redirected to a website saying my track was not found. It’s like the track was… half-uploaded. [image] I have faced this problem before, but the second time I uploaded it work…

Read full topic
item.source: Not able to upload to soundcloud
